dialog_nodes.title: Users does not want to be called back
Users wants to be called back

values: Sure! Please help us with the below information.

values.text: The minimum balance to avoid fees on your trading account is \$ 1000.
Our office is open Mon-Sat 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. We are closed on Sundays. Please keep in mind hours are subject to change during the holidays.
I can help schedule an appointment with one of our licensed advisors. What date would you like to schedule it for ?

values: IBM Stock Trader offers a wide variety of services:

values.text: What stock(s) would you like to add and how many ?

generic.title: Which phone number did you want to update?
